balanceOf(address).details: calculates the debt balance of account

params._amount: is the amount of token to be burnt*
params._from: is the address where the tokens will be burnt

mint(address,address,uint256).details: mint debt tokens to the debtOwner address

params._amount: the amount of debt tokens to mint
params._debtOwner: the address to mint the debt tokens to
params._to: the address requesting the debt, when (_to != _debtOwner) debtOwner must have  delegated some borrow allowance to the _to address

totalSupply().details: Returns the amount of tokens in existence.

_DEBT_BORROW_DELEGATE_SIGNATURE_TYPE_HAS.details: debt token delegate borrow message digest

burn(address,uint256).notice: burn is an only owner function that allows the owner to burn  tokens from an input account

increaseTotalDebt(uint256).notice: used to increase the debt of the system

userBorrowAllowanceNonce(address).notice: mapping of user to approval nonce
